title: Betrayal of a Stranger
description: Vanessa's life is turned upside down when she fulfils a promise with the enchantment of a childhood dream but there was a price to pay for which she never bargained and falls prey to the harshness and cold realities within a world for which she is unprepared. Lies and deceit, greed and jealousy and the ultimte betrayal leads her to nothingness and desolation whilst she is unwittingly sucked into a void of emptiness she is forced to embrace......but then a stranger comes along and wields a double-edged sword that leaves a wound only he can eradicate!
author: Trudy J. Blaine
